sentence: Douyin Traceability Season Event Feihe and distributors participated in the Douyin Traceability Season event Feihe has always adhered to a responsible approach towards consumers, employing systems like the Complaint Verification and Reporting Process to swiftly identify and track complaint risks, ensuring timely issue resolution.

Monthly performance indicators encompass quality, delivery, and service metrics, while the annual assessment includes four components regular monthly performance, problem resolution (closure and reevaluation of issues), special audits (routine inspections, spot checks), and positive negative incident evaluations.
